name: AudioDroidVR
description:
Just imagine it.
Droids from everywhere... shooting at you with their weirdly shaped guns and music.
Basically Guardians of the Galaxy in VR.
The other way to look at it is music visualizer in VR.

Hello guys,

my name is Sir Fansi and I make a new VR game every week, so feel free to check this one out and let me know what you think! If you wanna keep up with what I am doing: https://www.instagram.com/sir_fansi/
